name: amok
text: Again, the last panel floors me. Poor Roast Beef, he is not a happy cat :(

name: wae
text: The man can get Hosed, even while getting Hosed.

name: landowmpg
text: The "AS YOU MAY HAVE NOTICED..." tells me that there was more to the tape before the part we see.  I would have liked to know what exactly took place before Ray makes this admission.

name: dusty
text: Probably Ray singing Pumps n' a Bump .

name: ravindra108
text: It was when he said "Dear Roast Beef."

name: tim
text: A comment left by tim was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Jesler729, sticks, Crater12)

name: aarongstock
text: Someone should make a profile and, on all the strips, post a comment saying what you just did.

name: kledermans
text: Someone should?  I think half a dozen have.

name: dovey
text: THAT'S THE JOOOOOOOOKE

name: overmedicated
text: Excellent avatar/post sychronicity.

name: klaus
text: The last panel is a masterpeice.

name: insomnia
text: God, this strip deserves all sorts of medals.

name: magb
text: Ray's gotta do what he's gotta do, but he don't gotta like it.

name: anomalous3
text: You get the sense that, while "Circumastances" are responsible for Beef's major problem, Ray is responsible for most of his subtle neuroses

name: waitwhat
text: I AM SORRY ABOUT THIS ROAST BEEF.

name: epicurus
text: It is ALL the last panel fuck I love this one.

name: qingofchina
text: A comment left by qingofchina was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, FillerCrowley, riotdejaneiro, mortshire, syrupykeyboard, Danjoebak, Sal, mystkmanat, Circadin)

name: zefiel
text: Beef's Mother killed his father.

name: 1000hz
text: There is nothing more that needs to be said about The Last Panel besides that it is the best panel ever paneled.

name: nessotron
text: This strip just makes you want to walk into your screen and give Beef a hug. I mean just look at that expression.

name: never_die
text:
ray had to repeat himself from yesterday's strip.
beef knew what was coming, he just didnt want it to end, yet. just another moment in the office. just another moment away from the trailer park where he wears those headphones that are no where remotely near his ears.

name: starman11
text:
He couldn't figure out how to record cds onto a tape.
Ray is so maddeningly dumb sometimes. Poor Beef.

name: rizzle
text: The headphones and the shirt and tie bring it all together

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "I was like, now maybe I can get a small dog or puppy?"

name: tekende
text: I don't understand the alt text here but it is sort of funny in a "what the hell?" kind of way.

name: bean
text: The alt text is Onstad revealing his own thoughts.  "No job; get a dog!"  It's a common reaction to being let go.  Next time your in the city, checkout the number of jobless types you see sitting on the curb with dogs.  The number is big.  Most people don't realize it, but a layoff-dog purchase is the first step on the staircase out of your house, the staircase to homelessness.

name: tekende
text: I have no idea whether you're kidding or not.

name: tonyhighwind
text: I really don't think he is.

name: rowboat
text: Seems to check out.

name: farqussus
text: when is the white paper release?

name: nutmeg
text: this may be my favorite strip of all time

name: soilentshuggah
text: Top ten last panel.

name: evolume
text: He cold gave him the tape anyways.

name: philosophe
text:
I like to think there is a pause:
I AM SORRY ABOUT THIS.... ROAST BEEF.

name: philosophe
text:
Actually I realized that I'm thinking of a full stop:

I AM SORRY ABOUT THIS. ROAST BEEF.

name: cuneocapo
text: who knew you could still be best friends with the man who had you fired

name: f1shst1ck
text: You are leaving the company. Thats like saying to somebody that they've been volunteered

name: endoftheworld
text: This was the strip that did it for me. Now I'm checking this webpage every dang day.

name: hyetal
text: I half-imagine that perhaps Ray became distracted making the tape, walked away with it still running and filled it with idle white noise.  And then I can easily imagine Roast Beef sitting there listening to the noise until the harsh CLICK ends it and snaps him back to his senses.

name: tbtabby
text: Keep on pavin' that road to Hell, Ray.

name: deovalente
text: Achewood is the only comic that can pull off two punchlines.

name: tekende
text:
It's a bizarre train of thought: he tries to make a mixtape but can't figure out how. Upon realizing this, rather than just not doing it, he decides to record a message saying that there is no tape, and then give Beef the tape. It is beyond my ability to comprehend. A normal person would have just not made the tape and not mentioned it at all.

But this is Ray Smuckles we're talking about, and he gets things done, even if they're not done the correct way.

name: gussiejives
text: Worst severance ever.

name: spinynorman
text: Onstad made it sound like his severance package included doubloons and four ounces of pure uncut heroin. I think he did a little better.

name: laserblade
text: Transplendent.  Just fucking transplendent.

name: snowman
text: so fucking good.  definitely one of my fave all-time achewoods.

name: catbark
text: I love how Ray doesn't let on when he gives him it, still acting like he managed to make a real mix tape.

name: redmange
text:
This is one of the few strips that causes me to laugh in hysterics every time I read it.

I AM SORRY ABOUT THIS ROAST BEEF

name: lux
text: he maybe noticed it's not a mix tape while listening

name: dovey
text: I like that Beef in the last panel became the basis of the "What We Need More of is Science" shirt design. That is a good design, and I have it. (But it is on a hooded jumper)

name: rabbidpanda
text: Roast Beef is most saddened by the fact that he would have helped Ray make the tape, knowing full well that it is his severance.

name: rykan
text: Story of the dude's life...

name: sweetlips
text: [pic] http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_DIO8HVF6lag/SZXtsm7UaCI/AAAAAAAAAAM/uRxwf1Bk2Fo/s1600-h/godFREAKINGOUT.PNG [pic]

text: [img]http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_DIO8HVF6lag/SZXtsm7UaCI/AAAAAAAAAAM/uRxwf1Bk2Fo/s1600-h/godFREAKINGOUT.PNG[img]

name: fineoakstructure
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: fineoakstructure
text: I tried, dude.

name: rowboat
text: It was so unfunny that assetbar rejected it.

name: lucid
text: This is my absolute favourite. I can say no more on the topic without gushing embarrassingly.

name: benhead
text: Man, between this and what he does to Phillipe later on when they're business partners..you'd better have your own lawyer before drafting a business agreement with Ray!  He's a shark!

name: rocketbunny
text: The number of punchlines in this strip boggle the mind. Beef is volunteered to leave the company, his severance is a tape of Ray apologizing for there not actually being a mix tape, and the company is left in the hands of the cat of such incompetence as to not know how to make a mix tape .
